Description.Name: Improved Power Conduits
Description.Details: Running power through patched-together conduits isnâ€™t reliable or safe. Upgrading all the conduits throughout the Argo is a monumental task, but necessary for anything that places a significant load on the system.

AssignedCastDescription: Notably, upgrading the power system will allow us to provide power to all three habitation pods, which means more room and more Argo systems operational.
